eshmun.modelrepair

Class ModelRepairer

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.modelrepair.ModelRepairer

  • public class ModelRepairer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a model repairer, it repairs a given model according to its specifications.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean actionSync
      Flags whether or not to sync based on action names.
      private Repairable model
      The model.
      private AndOperator notCNF
      The repair formula not in CNF.
      private int[] numbers
      After repair, this will contain structure and repair related numbers, for example: number of literals in the formula, number of deleted states, etc..
      private boolean processSync
      Flags whether or not to sync on process labels combined with from and to states labels.
      private boolean repaired
      flags whether the model has been repaired.
      private AndOperator repairFormula
      The repair formula.
      private SAT4jSolver solver
      The SAT Solver to use in solving.

    • Field Detail

      • repaired

        private boolean repaired
        flags whether the model has been repaired.

      • solver

        private SAT4jSolver solver
        The SAT Solver to use in solving.

      • notCNF

        private AndOperator notCNF
        The repair formula not in CNF.

      • repairFormula

        private AndOperator repairFormula
        The repair formula.

      • model

        private Repairable model
        The model.

      • numbers

        private int[] numbers
        After repair, this will contain structure and repair related numbers, for example: number of literals in the formula, number of deleted states, etc.. Order and meaning match that of StatsDialog.

      • actionSync

        private boolean actionSync
        Flags whether or not to sync based on action names.
        See Also:
        MultiKripkeStructure.actionSynchronizationFormula()

      • processSync

        private boolean processSync
        Flags whether or not to sync on process labels combined with from and to states labels.
        See Also:
        MultiKripkeStructure.processSynchronizationFormula()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelRepairer

        public ModelRepairer(Repairable model,
                     java.util.List<AbstractExpression> specifications,
                     AbstractExpression structureFormula,
                     boolean actionSync,
                     boolean processSync)
              throws NotCNFException,
                     org.sat4j.reader.ParseFormatException,
                     java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create a new model repairer that will repair model against specifications.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to repair.
        specifications - the specifications to repair against.
        structureFormula - an additional user defined structural formula that will be appended to the repair formula.
        actionSync - flags whether or not to sync based on action names.
        processSync - flags whether or not to sync on process labels combined with from and to states labels.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred while reading the expression by the solver.
        org.sat4j.reader.ParseFormatException - if the expression was not in CNF.
        NotCNFException - if the expression was not in CNF.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specifications refer to labels not present in structure.

    • Method Detail

      • modelRepair

        public boolean modelRepair()
                    throws org.sat4j.specs.TimeoutException
        Repairs the Model.
        Returns:
        true if model is repair-able, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        org.sat4j.specs.TimeoutException - if time run out while attempting to solve.

      • getNextDeletions

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getNextDeletions()
                                                        throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                                               org.sat4j.specs.TimeoutException
        Returns the deleted states and deleted transitions after repair, if the model was not repaired, it throws an exception.
        Returns:
        a list of strings, each is a name of a transition or state that was deleted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the model was not repaired prior to calling this method.
        org.sat4j.specs.TimeoutException - if time run out while attempting to solve.

      • getNumbers

        public int[] getNumbers()
        Returns:
        The last repair benchmarks (or null if no last repair occurred).
